title: Resolution on Foster’s Payer State Legislation Introduced in Illinois State Senate (Bill Foster)
text: ( Source : Bill Foster ) Aurora, IL - On Tuesday, October 20 , 2015 , State Senator Pat McGuire introduced Senate Resolution 1102, urging the United States Congress to pass Congressman Foster 's Payer State Transparency Act. Every year, tens of
